Yep caught in the spam filter. Sorry but it happens to all of us. I think sometimes when we reply to a message they have a long "history" of other posts and it blocks them. Sort of like a chain letter. Good rule of thumb is remove everything in the section below except the part you are replying to. That usually solves the problem.

Misty
--- On Thu, 5/21/09, Kristin <ckmorris95@...> wrote:

This is the third time I have tried to send this message... errr .. I must be getting caught in the spam filter. ANyway..
